document.full_text: simon gagne snapped a tie in the third period for the tampa bay lightning, who erased an early three-goal deficit and evened the eastern conference finals with a 5-3 win on saturday.
document.title: lightning 5, bruins 3: lightning use big rally to even series
lines_and_colors: simon gagne snapped a tie in the third period for the tampa bay lightning, who erased an early three-goal deficit and evened the eastern conference finals with a 5-3 win on saturday.
